tupleIsValid

public boolean tupleIsValid(java.lang.String[] fields)
Check if the tuple that is retrieved from the input file is valid according to the catalog information about this stream tuples. If it is not valid, ignore it.

Parameters:
fields - the attributes of the tuple.
Returns:
true if the tuple is valid, false otherwise.
